name: Tower Run: Hard to defeat (Strange Games)
name_original: Tower Run: Hard to defeat (Strange Games)
description:
Tower Run is a new Fast Pace, Time Precise , Frustrating Reflexive game Free to play  There is only one Level and it is hard, new levels will be added very Soon  Play as a Boy who turned into a Ball and Try to reach the Top of the Towers                                                                               

Time your Jump to the Precise to dodge all the Enemies

There is no time limit and no death count, just you have to reach the Top

But it's no easy task, you have to dodge different different types of Enemies in your way

There are no breaks in this game so don't expect a Pause button in this game

Types of Enemies:
  • Static Enemy
  • Moving Enemy
  • Resizable Enemy
  • Invisible Enemy
  • A.I. Enemy (Enemy which can follow to you but in a very Slow Speed)

Navigate your way through these Enemies and don't Die

Game Controls:
  • use Mouse click to Jump Left and Right
  • SpaceBar can also be used to Jump 
  • Arrow keys ← → can also be used to Jump
  • A, D keys can also be used to Jump
  • V key for Audio on/off
  • Q key for Quit only when you are in Main, Lost or Won page
  • Enter or Mouse click can be to used to press play button
Features of this game:
  • interesting
  • frustrating
  • jumping
  • dodge enemies
  • difficult
  • precise timing 
  • enemies with different different abilities
  • and more
Credits:
  • All the Sprites in this game is either developed or modified by me (Strange Games)
  • Music (Beast) in this game is produced by me (Strange Games)
  • Game is being developed by me (Strange Games)
This game is being developed in Godot game engine I'am providing you with a Tower Run.zip file If on windows, use executable (Tower Run.exe) file to run the Game and keep "Tower Run.pck" file in same file as "Tower Run.exe" file New Levels will be available Sooner then Soon This my First Project/Game
